name: Goblin Kingdom
description:
Goblin Kingdom is an adventure platformer.

You have been kidnapped by goblins, shrunk down to their size, and whisked away to a dungeon in their underground kingdom. You must find a way to escape to the surface and return to your normal size.

Controls are WSAD / arrow keys for movement, SPACE to interact, M for map and ESC to pause.

It's still in development, but I figured getting player feedback would be really useful at this stage. Let me know what you think!

I've had one user report the .exe is getting flagged as malware. I promise it's not! You should be able to click "more information" on the warning then "run anyway".

I've uploaded a zip version as an alternative which shouldn't trigger any false positive warnings.
